channel.title: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!" - Trying to recruit new members for some smaller villages

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
I need villagers, the village was just started at dayroll.
i only have 2 (including myself)
need people who are willing to have fun and go with out some upgrades for a while.
will have party house at dayroll as long as we get one more resource.
so please come and visit Tsukuyomii village i stocked storehouse up.
rules aren't too strict and right now i'm lenient due to the fact that we don't have many villagers.
any way good luck to everyone
your fellow ninja,
Pupp

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
TSW Village is looking for new active players, we have 9 players at the moment most of them Alts os season 2/3 players so there is a lot of knollege here.

We also have loads of Bitter Medicine for the Genins and Chunins. All players are rewarded for helping out :) and we are working as a team to help the village grow.

So if you want to join mention this post and I'll sort out a welcome package for you ;)

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Wood village need members. We have a party house, But we really need members badly.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Ghetto village is also looking for members were currently at 46 members and 62 or so upgrades.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Yo dude one of my members is one of yours. Wanna ally? He sadi you would i think we did.member the Uchiha? Yeh thats me. Wana join my alliance.?

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Kamkatana Village is in need of new and active Ninja. I have recently taken over as new Kage of the village and want to make it grow. We are a small village (6) with several upgrades but many of which have been disabled because of village membership size depletion. We need people who are active that can collect resources, patrol, etc of any Ninja level. If you would like to join us, please apply! ( I pretty much won't turn away anyone at the moment as long as they are active).

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Manifest Village has open slots and has Epic ;)

feel free to join.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: We are still accepting people when we have space. Right now we are full. The only time we usually have space is when someone quits or goes really inactive without word, both of these I can not predict.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: is wiki village still accepting, i'm planning to join if it's ok.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Saelance Village needs new members. Currently we only have 3 members. The Kage is Heiji, currently s2 chunin. My alt is in the village, s1 Chunin. The third member is my friends alt, Sousuke s1 genin. Anybody that wants to join will be accepted and appreciated. Thanks!

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I just posted about my village the Whirlpools village with an s We sprang up last night and have only 1 member please read my thread for more details.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Please, join the Ake Enjeru Village. We need more people there to buy upgrades, we have money and resouces but not people.
We really need people there. Thanks.

Pessoal do Brasil que por acaso lerem isso, me dêem uma força lá por favor. Valeu!

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: join dotaportal village we have alot of money and resources but need more people (we only have around 25 now). you get cookies for joining =D.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Shinogobmi village is also looking for members. Already have all village size 5 upgrades but only 2 people in village (most left and the other one is non-playing for a while, sadly enough).
We have more than enough resources and ryo (lots in village and leader has over 150000 to invest in village) so once we get more members we'll instantly get new upgrades and into the war.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
If advertising is allowed, then I would like to say that my main character's village, Quiet Village, needs some active members. Members, at least. We have tons of upgrades but due to lack of people they don't work, such as War Room, Potion Palace and Arms Depot. Currently we have 11 members, duplicate ip-players and lazy players are not counted.

We also have an automatic +20 stamina bonus through the upgrade Tofu Shop.

So, if you're looking for a nice village (especially nice if you're a beginner) with a laid-back atmosphere, please apply for the Quiet Village.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Hi, I'm Rand of Emonds Village. We would be looking for players, too. We're 30 now, but we need some more to be able to compete against bigger villages once we build our Natural Research Facility.

byebye

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Hi I am iceman of Eclipse village I am looking for new members.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: l33t village needs villagers badly, at least five to get into the war.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Already got that team, yes they rule. I need to level billy and emosuke to 2 next. Too bad I cant get the Cds to drop

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Not a problem! We've got plenty of space still.

Before you go for Snakes, make sure you've got 3 level 2 allies to bring with you. Ro-Sham-Bo Redux is great for that.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I'll make sure to buy my +10% ryo item before leaving then :> If im gonna get snakeman in the interim It's gonna take me a few days, being that im in the 3 day hole for the reaper mission. But after that expect a request.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Then the only thing to warn you of is that we're not currently in the NWW. We should have the correct number of people for it after today, but we're still lacking the basic resources. There's also a question of whether it's a good idea to go into the war with literally no other upgrades ;)

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I'm really looking for just a bit more community than my current village. I'm in the middle of the reaper stuff, then i'll be doing the trade, and it will be ages before I can even consider becoming a sanin, so i dont really see how i'd be that limited. I think I'd make a decent asset to a village thats just starting up, rather than a +1 patroller like my current village.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
I've heard references to a Rogue Jonin mission line, but I don't believe it's complete yet. The only thing available as a Rogue Jonin that I know of is Wake the Snake which you can use to get SNAKEMAN. If you do leave your current Village, you have to wait 2 days before you join a new one as well.

Do what you think is best for you, while Wiki Village can always use more people to help, we really are just a starting Village. You'll be rather limited in what you can do for a bit until we get some upgrades.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I might be interested in joining wiki village, i use this resource a lot and everyone seems very helpful and cool. Does anyone have any info on the secret bonus you can get from being an unvillaged jonin? With some more info I'd leave my hohum village and join up.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Oh, I forgot, the current tax rate is 10% ^_^U

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Well, since everyone is doing this…

:Ahem:

Come and join Dark Star Village, I need more members, it haves Party House (and yes, it eats your money, but is worth it, I have The Rack and Yuri, and a member have K-Dog Headband), and that's all (the others upgrades aren't of much use to the members, but there is tha Hitaiate Maker, Banker and Collection Squad as well).

Now, I'm thinking about going to a village in war for the test to become Sp. Jounin.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Sorry Rand, I got accepted into Blazon.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Chidon: Yes no problem. Only thing is please go patrolling or collecting while you're in Emonds. thanks in advance ; )

Mastigos: Allright!

See you (both) in Emonds ; )

If anybody else wants to do their exams, either just write a message here or just write Wiki+exam in your application. As long as I don't have more than 26 villagers you can join anytime (you can look that up on this wiki-page here, daiky uodated ; ) Of course you can stay forever if you want, too.

*mumbling*hihihi

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Righty, I've left my current village with my Primary, will be taking him to Emonds for the Jonin Exam etc

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Could I join the Emonds village to take my Sp. Jonin exam?

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Aaah speaking of selfishness,

Emonds Village, the village hidden in the novel, my home-village, needs some members too.
We are in the war and anybody who's interested please visit the site here or just apply at BvS.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: No need to apologize for being selfish, but unfortunately I haven't got any alts available. With the Wiki being what it is, I haven't really time to play more than one character in a usual day (while maintaining my normal workload and personal relationships, etc).

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Mastigos, you are invited to do your exam in Emonds Village, if you want.

Uzuki: do you have any alts for a trade? I would send one of mine by if I got one of yours in return. They are all bound, you see, and I can't take them away without a sure profit. sorry for being selfish

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
I need to find a village to test for Jonin in, my Primary is lvl38 & should be able to make 40 in 2 or 3 days, my main village is size 15 & not sure if we'll make it to Size 20 in the near future.

Thanks for accepting the request that quickly btw

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: Anyone is welcome at this point, we could really use the members :) Just toss an application in game and I'll let you in as soon as I can.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I've got a Secondary character I'll throw into the Wiki village if ya want, Mastigos is the character name.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: The party house eats my money T_T I really should put Billy back in my party with how often I use the stupid thing…

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: No problem, I've got a spot available just for you! With any luck, we'll at least have the Party House before you get here.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I don't really have friends so to speak in my old village. I'm friendly with all of them yea, but…not like…buddies or anything like that. And yea, your right, it would be tasteless ~_^ hence why I'm just asking for info hehe. I think i'll go hop off my current village then, I really do wanna come to this one. Sounds like you could use another Chunin :3 save me a spot in a couple days yes?

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
You hit the "Leave Village" button ;) You may have to enter your password as well. After that, there's a 2 day cooldown before you can join a new Village, so you'd be on your own for a couple days (which means tax free missions, woo!). Your headband also has a line drawn through the middle of it, to indicate you're a missing-nin.

After that, it's just like joining a Village anew again.

We'd be glad to have you on board, but I think it'd be really tasteless of me to try and talk people out of abandoning their current villages. If you think your interests would be well served by joining the Wiki Village, come on over! If you really have friends in your current village, or there are certain things you need to take care of (making Special Jonin & Jonin, making the trade, etc), by all means, stick with your current Village.

While I'm hoping Wiki Village grows quickly, we really haven't got too much to offer quite yet.

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded: I really shouldn't be so tempted to come join Wiki…but this place is way to much fun. Since I've never even looked at it before, what exactly goes into the process of leaving a village?

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Wiki Village literally just came into existence last night, so we haven't got a whole lot going yet. There's two more Jonin coming over on Friday (2 day lockout from Village transfer), and probably a Chunin or two that I'm expecting to be joining up.

Gonna need some time to get into the War though. That requires 10 people and a fair amount of resources. The goal is to rush to the war as fast as possible though (probably dangerously fast!).

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
There's a Wiki village? o.o; Wow, why am I suddenly so tempted to jump ship from my village to come to Wiki…

I only have two questions. Do you have party house and are you in the war :3

item.title: Re: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
Indeed, this is definitely a good place to recruit!

The Wiki Village, the Village Hidden in Information is also recruiting and in need of members!

item.title: Villages in Need of Members - Please Join!
item.content:encoded:
If anyone is interested in joining a new village, or need one for a new character, I know a couple that need new members.

Succubus Village is home to my main character. We just recently joined the Ninja World War and have about 16 members. We're gaining upgrades pretty quickly, so join up if you want to help up build a new major power in the war.

Reiki Village is home to my secondary character and we just hit 7 members, I think. We're in desperate need of new members!
